name: Keep up the Good Fight
summary: Your devotion to helping others and doing good keeps you going, even against insurmountable odds.
description:
Your devotion to helping others and doing good keeps you going, even against insurmountable odds. Instead of being knocked out, you are reduced to 1 Hit Point, gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 round, and increase your wounded value by 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
